itunes:title: Bestselling Jane Green's Advice to Writers
title: Bestselling Jane Green's Advice to Writers
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with the delightful international bestselling author, Jane Green, about her twenty-five year career in publishing. Jane gives insight with regards to rejection letters, bidding wars, bestselling novels, a writer's brand, when it's time to change agents or publishing houses, appreciating success, and the extreme highs and lows that are all a part of the industry.
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with the delightful international bestselling author, Jane Green, about her twenty-five year career in publishing. Jane gives insight with regards to rejection letters, bidding wars, bestselling novels, a writer's brand, when it's time to change agents or publishing houses, appreciating success, and the extreme highs and lows that are all a part of the industry.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais and Jane Green
itunes:keywords: Jane Green, bidding wars, overcoming rejection, publishing, emerging writers, authors, advances, success in publishing, book buzz, book tours, agents, editors,
